text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response successfully cites relevant laws and rules supporting the comparative analysis across all required areas. Specifically, it references the Hague Service/Evidence Conventions implicitly through the discussion of procedural rules (CPR, ZPO, CCP), the UK Companies Act 2006 and UK Corporate Governance Code, German laws (AktG, KonTraG/HGB, ZPO), US/California regulations (ASC 450, CCP, Cal. Civ. Code), and specific insurance/auditing standards (UK Insurance Act 2015, VVG, California Insurance Code, IDW PS, PCAOB/AU-C 501).
